description: Custom version of the default Cinnamon Menu applet, but infinitely more customizable.
contributors: NikoKrause: Bug fixes and German localization.
lestcape: Author of some advanced features used by this applet.
nooulaif: Fuzzy search feature based on his Sane Menu applet.
Daniel Bruce: Some icons used by this menu are from www.entypo.com.
comments: Bug reports, feature requests and contributions should be done on this xlet's repository linked below.
name: Custom Cinnamon Menu
